comments:
Found in log testing 10/17 version. Actually ... I was wondering why I could 
see this in PDE Schema validation messages (after loading released projects)
.... I suggest you turn that checking on my default. 

I'm putting as "major P2" since this is one of the exit criteria, though, 
frankly, I don't know what function is lost, so if no function lost, you might
argue the severity and priority is not so high (but still ... a "clean" import
was one of the exit criteria every one's looking at).
